creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Ground cloth of alternating brown and maroon threads, warp stripes in yellow, maroon, grey-green, red; four rows of small decorative patterns on lower legs, "cuff" embroidered with herringbone stitch in gold, green, yellow, pink, purple, blue in zigzag pattern.
title: Pants (Pantalones)
